#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long int lli;
using namespace std;

int main()
{
//    cout << "Hello world!" << endl;
   lli T;
   scanf("%lld",&T);
   while(T--)
   {
       lli N;
       scanf("%lld",&N);
      if(N%4 == 0)
        cout<<"Second"<<endl;
       else
        cout<<"First"<<endl;
   }
        return 0;
}
